question: Which among the following is the correct statement representing frequently used word “Loan Servicing”?
option1: Loan Servicing is the after sales service provided by the Banks to the customers
option2: Loan Servicing is the repayment of loans to the Banks
option3: Loan Servicing is the facility provided by the banks to make the loans easily accessible to the customers
option4: Loan servicing is paying the interest on loans
answer: Loan servicing is paying the interest on loans
